Often leading a small team of lower-ranking guards, watch officers patrol their assigned areas to maintain order and enforce laws. Watch officers get the job done, though their methods aren't always gentle or kind. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 [Watch Officer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3556) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 113 **Perception** +8; (9 to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=2302)) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +11, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +9, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +5 **Str** +4 **Dex** +1 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), [Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Signal Whistle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=50), [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10), [warhammer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=24) --- **AC** 19 (21 with shield raised) **Fort** +10 **Ref** +6 **Will** +8 **HP** 45 **Air of Authority** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) 10 feet. Creatures in the aura who are the same or lower level than the watch officer take a –2 status penalty to their Will DC against the watch officer's attempts to [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=2394) or [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=2395) them.
**Bravery** When the watch officer rolls a success on a Will save against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598) effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, any time they gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) condition, reduce its value by 1.
**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)**
**[Shield Block](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=75)** --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** warhammer +13 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)), **Damage** 1d8+7 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4+7 bludgeoning **Ranged** crossbow +10 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d8+3 piercing **Sudden Charge** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The watch officer Strides twice. If they end their movement within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy.
